Settings.Full: ProtoMech Point consist of 5 ProtoMechs. Doesn't track Heat.
ProtoMech Jump systems provide {0} Hex Jump Capacity. Can't perform DFA attacks.
ProtoMech Equipment uses the Specialist Slot.
Represents ProtoMech 'Frenzy' attack that combines a punch, a kick and anything else the ProtoMech can muster.
This not half-ton sized ammo box can only be used on ProtoMechs
Enables Physical Weapon Melee Attacks. Damage is {0} per Trooper. Attacks roll on the Kick Table.
ProtoMech only weapon. Has 3 tubes with advanced guidance and Streak system. Uses fusillade iATM ammo and has only 1 reload.
This ProtoMech is equipped with Electric Discharge ProtoMech Armor, which adds Mech Taser-like effect to frenzy attacks with cooldown of 6 turns.
WiGE ProtoMech can change between 'Mech and Flight Mode. Deploys in Flight.
WiGE ProtoMech in Flight is unaffected by Ground Effects and Minefields.
WiGE mode provides {0} Max Evasion, and {1} Evasion Pips gained from movement
